properties.entry: INSERT INTO ASK ( ASK_NO , ASK_WRITER , CATEGORY , ASK_TITLE , ASK_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_ASKNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , REF_BOARD_NO , REF_NO , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 1 , SEQ_ASKNO.CURRVAL , ? )

SELECT ASK_NO , ASK_WRITER , NICKNAME , CATEGORY , ASK_TITLE , ASK_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "ENROLL_DATE" , COUNT , (SELECT FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = A.ASK_NO AND REF_BOARD_NO = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) "TITLEIMG" FROM ASK A JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (ASK_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
